entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with NavigationPage Root Navigation in .NET MAUI - ANDROID #25187
  • iOS - Keyboard changes page layout, and doesn't always return back to normal #25185
  • iOS carousel view - accessibility, using screen reader - doesn't raise a PositionChanged event #25182
  • [IOS] CollectionView with HorizontalGrid Layout did not align single item properly. #25181
  • MAUI app build is broken with .NET 8.0.403 #25179
  • Camera preview is freezing when rotating and using FlyoutPage on iOS #25174
  • .net9 RC2 - Compiled Bindings - cannot resolve type in StaticResource #25172
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • ios smart quotes replacing normal double quotes when a json file is loaded with the file picker #25168
  • Invalid stack map table at instruction index 177: invokespecial Ljava/lang/IllegalArgumentException;<init>(Ljava/lang/String;)V, error: Unexpected attempt to initialize initialized java.lang.IllegalArgumentException. #25167

Closed

  • Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #19246
    Backlog
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton if initially hidden and shown even if ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25038
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #24783
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [regression/8.0.99-ci.net8.24472.1] Invalidate Shadow Issue: VisualElement.Shadow property change no longer invalidates platform shadow #24882
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [iOS] CollectionView Group Header & Footer Templates cause immediate crash on iOS 18 #25139
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • SKStoreReviewController is deprecated in iOS 18, and replacement is not accesible in MAUI. #25169
  • iOS "dotnet" exited with code 150. (MSB6006) #25165
  • Failure to navigate to some pages on iOS and Mac Catalyst in 8.0.90 (works in 8.0.82, 8.0.40) #24897
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #11896
    Backlog
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Blue notification / action bar started to appear on all modal pages #24232
    9.0-rc2
  • [iOS] Freezing issue on loading #24895
    .NET 8 SR9.2

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25184
  • [X] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25183
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Testing] More UITests extension methods using an IQuery as parameter #25177
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    community ✨
  • [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25173
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [iOS]Resolved Button Text Resets to Previous Value When Set to Empty String Programmatically. #25171
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    community ✨

Merged

  • [testing] Comment out flaky test #25188
    area-testing, testing-reenable, testing-green-ci
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25159
  • Fixed Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #25084
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements (#24859) #25158
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Preview SR9.2 branding #25161

Updated

  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Improve performance of rendering `DatePicker` #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    community ✨
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed VisualState Update for CollectionView SelectedItem #25145
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf
  • Fix and verify shadow / shape / clip #24941
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Add UITest Stepper actions #25130
    area-testing
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25152
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25151
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, stale
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖
